content.rendered:
Ina Magat

Recruiter Trainer

BA in Journalism:

University of the Philippines

 

ADVICE:

Advice for Candidates:  Know which aspects of your background set you apart from everyone else and capitalize on those points when you write your resume. We look at hundreds of resumes in a day, so yours must be both precise and convincing.

 

INSPIRATIONAL QUOTE:

“Good things happen to those who hustle.” – Anais Nin
